name: Mine Time
description:
In the depths of this ancient cave, a fuzzy creature awakens to find his home invaded with lethal mining equipment. Can the creature make it out alive?

Controls

Player 1

  • A - Go left
  • D - Go right
  • S - Descend from bridge
  • 1 - Jump
  • 2 - Activate invulnerability (single player)

Player 2

  • Left arrow - Go left
  • Right arrow - Go right
  • Down arrow - Descend from bridge
  • L - Jump

Global Highscore

Beat the best score in single or two-player mode!
